2023-02-02.name: Make My Day
2023-02-02.desc:
On a cold planet of ice and snow, mysterious creatures suddenly have appeared from the dark underground and have begun to attack the inhabitants. Can humanity survive the terror lurking beyond the horizon?

Source: netflix

2023-02-04.name: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

2023-02-05.name: Hirogaru Sky! Precure
2023-02-05.desc:
A major incident in peaceful Skyland?! The infant princess Elle-chan has been kidnapped by a monster from the Undergu Empire! A brave girl named Sora follows the princess into a strange hole. It leads her to another world called Sorashido City.

Televisions? Bicycles? Are these magical devices?!?! There's no time to be surprised! Sora has to take the princess back to the castle as soon as possible! Flying between two worlds! This is the beginning of a Precure adventure! It's hero time!

Source: Crunchyroll

2023-02-14.name: Spicy Candy
2023-02-14.desc:
Spicy is a young, sharp-tongued girl who sings about everyday trivial things, and lives with her black cat named Candy.

Source: ANN

2023-02-17.name: Blue Giant
2023-02-17.desc:
Dai lived a normal high school life in Sendai: a city of hot summer days and rainy nights. Between basketball, part time jobs, and an uncertain future, something was missing. And that thing was music. With his days in senior year running out, Dai swears a heartfelt vow: “I’m gonna be the best jazz player in the world.”

But what do you need to be the best? Talent? Effort? A lucky break? Or maybe just a deep, pure love for music, and too much stubbornness to know when to quit.

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment

2023-02-17.name: Eiga Sasaki to Miyano: Sotsugyou Hen
2023-02-17.desc: * Based on a boys life manga by Harusono Shou.

2023-02-17.name: Kuromi`s Pretty Journey
2023-02-17.desc:
Kuromi is traveling the world, searching for her missing older sister Romina. Throughout her journey, she gains companions, but also brushes up against evil organizations.

Source: ANN

2023-02-28.name: Kyouki Sanmyaku: Naked Peak
2023-02-28.desc:
A tourist jet to Antarctica mysteriously went missing. When a search team got to the point where the signal disappeared, they couldn't find the jet but they were met with a range of mountains unknown to humankind.

The unprecedented mountain range, with a height of over 34,000ft above sea level, surpassing Mount Everest, was beyond human comprehension.

Some daring souls are now attempting to reach that violent mountain. What will they encounter beyond the realm of death?

This is an animated movie based on "Mountains of Madness -Summit of Deities-", a TTRPG scenario that combines the "Cthulhu Mythos" & Mountain climbing.

A crowdfunding campaign was launched in October of 2021 for a full length production and successfully reached the set goal. The pilot film has been released in February 2023 as a first step towards the realization of a full-length feature film.
